name: Hewlett Packard Enterprise
goal: HPE is a technology company that operates in more than 150 countries around the world. We explore how technology and services can help people and companies address their problems and challenges, and realize their possibilities, aspirations and dreams. We apply new thinking and ideas to create more simple, valuable and trusted experiences with technology, continuously improving the way our customers live and work.
interests: Enterprise, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: IoT, Industry 4.0, Smart transportation and Connected Cars, Smart cities; High Performance Computing (HPC); Connectivity (5G, Wifi); Hybrid IT, Cloud; Data driven economy; eGovernment; Data Protection; Cybersecurity; Standards, Interoperability and Open-Source.
